section.section: Except as otherwise provided in a determination made under this section, the Administration shall deposit with the State Treasurer any money that it does not need to meet current expenses and obligations.

The State Treasurer shall:
credit the money to the Administration;
invest the money as provided by statute; and
credit earnings from the money to the Administration.
